title: RC Sproul Collection Preview [CSA]
description:
Welcome to the RC Sproul Collection Preview. Sit back and relax as you enjoy a sample video called "Ultimate Issues - His Word Is Truth". Also included are cover images of additional titles available in the 400 gigabyte mega-torrent "ChristianStuff". 

Our digital library offers hundreds of files in three categories: Christian, Health and Fiction.

The speed at which files can be retrieved depends on patrons making returns to the library by sharing the files they receive. In other words, the success of this archive depends on you!

To access the library you'll need to get the torrent file from TorCache or you can use the magnet link (THE LINKS ARE IN THE README).
_____________________________________________________________________________________

MORE INFO:

Dr. R.C. Sproul is a theologian who holds degrees from Westminster College, Pittsburgh Theological Seminary, and the Free University of Amsterdam. His teaching can be heard on the radio program "Renewing Your Mind", which is available worldwide.

Dr. Sproul serves as co-pastor of Saint Andrew's Chapel in Sanford, FL., president of the Reformation Bible College and is the founder and chairman of Ligonier Ministries.

For more than 40 years Ligonier Ministries' mission, passion and purpose has been to help people grow in their knowledge of God and His holines by helping Christians know what they believe, why they believe it, how to live it, and how to share it.
_____________________________________________________________________________________

TITLES:

Angels and Demons

Dealing with Difficult Problems

Dust to Glory

Hath God Said

Luther and the Reformation

Silencing the Devil

The Assurance of Salvation

The God We Worship

The Last Days According to Jesus

The Mystery of the Trinity

The Parables of Jesus

What is Reformed Theology

*** MORE ***
_____________________________________________________________________________________

That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory,
may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him...
Ephesians 1:17

ChristianStuff: Health mind, body and soul!
